## Return Value

An array of tracks of a specific media characteristic.

## Discussion

Apple discourages the use of this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, and macOS 12 or later. Load tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFragmentedAsset/loadTracks(withMediaType:completionHandler:)] instead.

You may call this method without blocking the current thread after you’ve asynchronously loaded the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/tracks] property.

# tracks(withMediaType:)

**Instance Method**

Returns tracks that present media of a specified type.

## Declaration

```swift
func tracks(withMediaType mediaType: AVMediaType) -> [AVFragmentedAssetTrack]
```

## Parameters

- **mediaType**: The media type according to which the asset filters its tracks. For valid values see [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaType].

## Return Value

An array of tracks of a specific media characteristic.

## Discussion

Apple discourages the use of this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, and macOS 12 or later. Load tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFragmentedAsset/loadTracks(withMediaType:completionHandler:)] instead.

You may call this method without blocking the current thread after you’ve asynchronously loaded the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/tracks] property.

## Accessing tracks

- **tracks**: The tracks an asset contains.
- **track(withTrackID:)**: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.
- **tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns tracks that present media of a specified characteristic.

items.description: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.

items.description: Returns tracks that present media of a specified characteristic.
